issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
In a mulit-cluster cloud the total EC2 Compute Available for one of my availablity-zones is reported as 4 available of 4 total. However, there are 4 instances running in that AZ and there should be 0 available.

See PARTI00 section below:
{code}
Capacity Report
Begin:Fri May 17 00:00:00 PDT 2013
End:Fri May 17 09:48:17 PDT 2013
Resource Usage Section
 	 	Resource	Available	Total
Cloud	S3 Storage	182	183
 	 	Elastic IP	1	8
 	 	EBS Storage	196	200
 	 	EC2 Compute	5	8
 	 	EC2 Disk	50	80
 	 	EC2 Memory	4608	8192
 	VM Types	c1.medium	0	4
 	 	c1.xlarge	0	4
 	 	cc1.4xlarge	0	0
 	 	cc2.8xlarge	0	0
 	 	cg1.4xlarge	0	0
 	 	cr1.8xlarge	0	0
 	 	hi1.4xlarge	0	0
 	 	hs1.8xlarge	0	0
 	 	m1.large	0	4
 	 	m1.medium	1	8
 	 	m1.small	1	8
 	 	m1.xlarge	0	4
 	 	m2.2xlarge	0	2
 	 	m2.4xlarge	0	0
 	 	m2.xlarge	0	4
 	 	m3.2xlarge	0	2
 	 	m3.xlarge	0	2
 	 	t1.micro	1	8
Availability Zone: PARTI01	EBS Storage	98	100
 	 	EC2 Compute	1	4
 	 	EC2 Disk	10	40
 	 	EC2 Memory	512	4096
 	VM Types	c1.medium	0	2
 	 	c1.xlarge	0	2
 	 	cc1.4xlarge	0	0
 	 	cc2.8xlarge	0	0
 	 	cg1.4xlarge	0	0
 	 	cr1.8xlarge	0	0
 	 	hi1.4xlarge	0	0
 	 	hs1.8xlarge	0	0
 	 	m1.large	0	2
 	 	m1.medium	1	4
 	 	m1.small	1	4
 	 	m1.xlarge	0	2
 	 	m2.2xlarge	0	1
 	 	m2.4xlarge	0	0
 	 	m2.xlarge	0	2
 	 	m3.2xlarge	0	1
 	 	m3.xlarge	0	1
 	 	t1.micro	1	4
Availability Zone: PARTI00	EBS Storage	98	100
 	 	EC2 Compute	4	4
 	 	EC2 Disk	40	40
 	 	EC2 Memory	4096	4096
 	VM Types	c1.medium	0	2
 	 	c1.xlarge	0	2
 	 	cc1.4xlarge	0	0
 	 	cc2.8xlarge	0	0
 	 	cg1.4xlarge	0	0
 	 	cr1.8xlarge	0	0
 	 	hi1.4xlarge	0	0
 	 	hs1.8xlarge	0	0
 	 	m1.large	0	2
 	 	m1.medium	0	4
 	 	m1.small	0	4
 	 	m1.xlarge	0	2
 	 	m2.2xlarge	0	1
 	 	m2.4xlarge	0	0
 	 	m2.xlarge	0	2
 	 	m3.2xlarge	0	1
 	 	m3.xlarge	0	1
 	 	t1.micro	0	4
{code}
fields.summary: Capacity Report shows incorrect number of Available EC2 Compute

comments.body:
Verified same result when using command line to generate a capacity report.

{code}
[root@c-07 ~]# eureport-generate-report -t capacity -s 2013-05-16 -e 2013-05-17 report.html
Exported data to report.html
[root@c-07 ~]# elinks -dump report.html
                                Capacity Report

    Begin:Thu May 16 00:00:00 PDT 2013

    End:Fri May 17 00:00:00 PDT 2013
